events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to know how I can get a refund. The product is not what I ordered, and I want to return it as soon as possible.
The case has been categorized as a refund request based on the customer's explanation regarding the incorrect item received.
The case has been assigned to agent Emily Johnson for further assistance with the refund process.
Hello, I’m Emily from customer support. I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund and return process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue and proceed?
Here is my order number 123456789 and attached is a clear photo showing the item I actually got instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. We will arrange a return shipping label for you and issue a full refund once the item is received back.
That sounds great, thank you for helping me sort this out quickly. I will send the package back as soon as I get the label.
We confirmed your return package has been received and your refund has been processed successfully. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
Just checking in to ensure everything is fine with your refund and if you have any additional questions or concerns we can help with.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support, have a great day!
